name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. James HILL, Appellant

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. James HILL, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 16th day of July, 1996, the above-captioned appeal is hereby dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
679 A.2d 1260
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. James HILL, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Jan. 22, 1996.
Decided July 16, 1996.
Before NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO and NEWMAN, JJ.
